name: Snowy Travels
description:
In Snowy Travels, experience a drive through a snowstorm. Do your best to avoid crashing! In this project, I use advanced dialogue options such as the triggering of exits/endings and shuffles to give the player a real sense of danger when driving recklessly in snowy conditions.

-----

Controls:

Keyboard, Arrow Keys

----

This non-fiction game was inspired by this article:

https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2022/02/18/illinois-interstate-car-traffic...
